document.heading: Equal Opportunity for Local, Small, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprises Act of 1992

history.narrative: Law 9-217, the “Equal Opportunity for Local, Small, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprises Act of 1992” was approved on December 29, 1992, assigned Act. No. 9-347 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-218 became law on March 17, 1993.
